= Introduction =

Welcome to the !BeanSoup sub project within SOAFaces. !BeanSoup is a collection of soafaces Bundles (SFBs). The individual bundles provide sample code for developers wanting to learn the different things you can do soafaces and also as a repository for SOAFaces components that developers can contribute to. You can download the collections of sample SFB components found in [Downloads BeanSoup here].
